title: URGENT, Please help
body: Ive paid back my Negative balance and i am missing RP and the account that was gifted it still banned.. Please hurry :D

replies.body:
If you're still seeing the issue with your account, you'll need to reach out to one of our account specialists so they can take a look into this with you. Submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to look into this further and work with you on a solution.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Iv noticed the synic on game could be pretty slow
xD game taxed you for the wait
